content.question: The Ardabil Carpet demonstrates continuity with Persian artistic traditions by featuring

choices.label: geometric motifs produced through highly detailed embroidery
complex patterns created through intricate hand knotting
narrative imagery fashioned by finely pieced quilting
brightly colored designs painted onto densely woven fabric

content.answer: complex patterns created through intricate hand knotting
